DOC.detailed_description: Study Groups : If find eligible take part study , 3 day complete baseline cycle test ( describe ) , randomly assign ( roll dice ) receive 1 follow 4 treatment second cycle test . Your study group assignment also base breathing symptom screen . - High-flow oxygen - Low-flow oxygen - High-flow air - Low-flow air You equal chance assign group . Neither study staff know treatment assign . However , need safety , study staff able find receiving . Study Visits : Baseline Cycle Tests : At time convenient screening , perform cycle test use stationary bicycle . You pedal resistance 60 second , warm 2 minute . You perform cycle test receive low-flow air long . Every 2 minute cycle test blood pressure , heart rate , blood oxygen level check . After 2-hour rest , perform cycle test use low-flow air long . Before cycle test , electrocardiogram ( EKG ) check heart function . Second Cycle Test : About 3 day baseline cycle test ( Â± 2 day ) , take part second cycle test . Before test , EKG . During test , receive type study treatment assign screen test . After cycle test , fill questionnaire complete screen . Length Study : You may take study problem complete either cycle test . Your participation study complete second cycle test fill questionnaire . This investigational study . The use high-flow air , low-flow air , high-flow oxygen , low-flow oxygen exercise treat breathing symptom consider investigational . Up 50 patient enrol study . All enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis cancer , evidence primary secondary lung involvement . 2 . Average dyspnea Borg Scale > /= 4 10 severe exertion past week 3 . Oxygen saturation > 90 % ambient air time assessment 4 . Able communicate English Spanish 5 . Karnofsky performance status > /=50 % 6 . Age > /=18 year 7 . Seen Supportive Care , cardiopulmonary center , thoracic radiation oncology thoracic medical oncology . 1 . Resting dyspnea modify Borg Scale > 7 10 enrollment . 2 . Severe obstructive lung disease ( FEV1/FVC < 70 % post bronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second < 30 % predict ) . 3 . Delirium ( i.e. , Memorial delirium rating scale > 13 ) . 4 . History unstable angina myocardial infarction last week . 5 . Acute pulmonary embolus pulmonary infarction last week . 6 . Thrombosis low extremity last week . 7 . Acute myocarditis , pericarditis , endocarditis last week . 8 . Symptomatic aortic stenosis syncope last week . 9 . Suspected dissect aneurysm . 10 . Severe untreated rest arterial hypertension ( > 200 mmHg systolic , > 120 mmHg diastolic ) time enrollment . 11 . Uncontrolled arrhythmias cause symptom hemodynamic compromise last week . 12 . Uncontrolled heart failure last week . 13 . Pleural effusion require thoracentesis within 1 week study enrollment schedule study period 14 . Airway obstruction require stenting within 1 week study enrollment schedule study period 15 . Pneumonia require antibiotic time study enrollment
